Title: Relates to acts of animal cruelty in the presence of a child
Summary: Defines "aggravated cruelty" and makes any person who commits the conduct which falls under that definition guilty of a class E felony, punishable by up to two years imprisonment; defines "in the presence of a child" and makes any person who commits the conduct which falls under that definition, guilty of a class D felony.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to acts of animal cruelty in the presence of a child
